title: Farm value per liter of maple syrup in Ontario 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Farm value per liter in Canadian dollars
summary: In general Farm value per liter in Canadian dollars has fallen over the Year.

Farm value per liter in Canadian dollars is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, rapidly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Farm value per liter in Canadian dollars, of value 15.59 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Farm value per liter in Canadian dollars about 12.87 was reached at Year 2016
